plot: Sunniva finds a map leading to the treasure of Kjuttaviga, and together with her friends, the former seaman Ruben the Red, and the innkeeper Tante Bassa, she decides to find it. ...
title: Kaptein Sabeltann og skatten i Kjuttaviga
plot_es: Sunniva finds a map leading to the treasure of Kjuttaviga, and together with her friends, the former seaman Ruben the Red, and the innkeeper Tante Bassa, she decides to find it. ...
